title: Does 9,995 Cents for Lentz Makes Sentz?  Sale Pending
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Does 9,995 Cents for Lentz Makes Sentz?  Sale Pending
posts.post_content:
Not to be confused with "The $100 Experiment Discussion Thread", this thread is for the sale of an SGC 40 Harry Lentz (Sentz) card with magnificent color, optimal centering and registration.  There are no creases.  This card would not be out of place in an SGC 50 holder,

Please add 0 cents for actual shipping and 0 cents for supplies and actual handling.  This beauty could be on the way to your place for 9,995 cents.
Pennies accepted, but not required or preferred for this sale.  PP F&F, MO, check or whatever net to me and its yours.

All right, you guys win.  

I'm going to make the shipping free.

You can forget about counting your pennies, Paypal is fine.;)
